author: hansbak
msg: Now allows for employees to add a note to the customer request, the customer gets notified by email with an url. If he logs in he can also add a note as a reply to the note of the employee, the employee will be notified with a system info message when the customer added the note

author: yegor
msg: Support fo text extraction of footnotes, endnotes and comments in HWPF, see Bugzilla 47400

author: yegor
msg: fixed typo in SlideShow.removeSlide which prevened deletion of slide's notes, see Bugzilla 47261

author: mjakl
msg: Split up the PubSubPersistenceManager into CollectionNodeStorageProvider and LeafNodeStorageProvider. Renamed to conform to the top-level interface naming (StorageProvider). (VYSPER-81)

author: mtylenda
msg: OPENJPA-1146: Delete RuntimeUnenhancedClassses and link references to RuntimeUnenhancedClasses
